    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Calendario
    Calendario class represents a calendar functionality where users can view, add, edit, and delete tasks, as well as navigate through months and view tasks associated with specific dates.
    CalendarioTest
     
    Colores
    Class that defines ANSI color codes used in the user interface.
    Conexion
    Conexion class provides the method to establish a connection to the MySQL database used by the application.
    Guardar
    Guardar class provides methods for saving and loading tasks from the database.
    Main
     
    Tarea
    Tarea class represents a task in the system with attributes such as name, start date, deadline, task type, description, completion status, and task ID.
    TipoTarea
    TipoTarea enum defines the different types of tasks that can be assigned within the system.
    Usuario
    Usuario class represents a user in the application.
    Visual
    Visual class is responsible for displaying the application's various user interface screens, including the main menu, calendar menu, and messages related to log-in, registration, task management, and user interactions.
